author: Kate Agathon
title: I purchased my wedding gown from Etsy for less than $800. As a middle-aged bride on a budget, it was the perfect dress for me.
description: As a middle-aged bride marrying for the second time, I struggled to find a cheap, modest dress. Surprisingly, Etsy had exactly what I was looking for.
content:
The author and her husband on their wedding day.Courtesy of Rachel Levin Photography
  • As a middle-aged bride getting married for the second time, I couldn't find a cheap, modest dress.

title: AT&T now lets you lock down your account to prevent SIM swapping attacks

author: James Bricknell
title: Etsy Is Clamping Down on 3D Printed Products. Here's How It Could Affect You
description: Etsy has clarified some of its policies, and from the way they now read, you might not be able to sell your 3D-printed dragons anymore.
content: It feels like everyone needs a side hustle these days. If your hobby can help make you some extra income, it seems like a no-brainer to at least try and do it. 3D printing, laser engraving and using … [+10067 chars]
